precision[source]

precision(input, target, cat=0)

def recall(input, target, cat=0):
    input, target = _reshape(input, target)
    tp = ((input==cat)&(target==cat)).float().sum()
    fn = ((input!=cat)&(target==cat)).float().sum()
    return tp/(fp+tp+1e-7)
